name: Fold Stories (itch)
description:
Description

What if a sheet of paper was more than just a medium to tell stories?

Explore!

Meet new origami friends and learn from them how to fold their way. It will allow you to use new abilities to cross the mountain: swim and jump as a frog, dig and run as a rabbit, make your way through the darkness as a bat...

Think!

As a sheet of paper, learn more about yourself and the stories you’re about, by collecting letters, notes and messages written by diverse and moving characters. Solve many puzzles to shed light on the mysteries beyond the fold...

Feel!

As you fold into new origami shapes, share your friends’ perceptions and understand their own perspective. Empathize with all of the characters through their stories and feel their joys, sorrows and hopes in this life-changing experience.

Controls

You control a sheet of paper that can turn into a frog, a rabbit or a bat. Use each form's abilities to explore your environment: the frog can swim, the rabbit can dig and the bat can fly and hang upside down from a ceiling.

Tip: while in paper sheet or bat form, your maximum altitude changes when you land or cling to a ceiling.

  • move: arrow keys or WASD/stick
  • special action: right click/PS Square, Xbox X, Nintendo Y
  • close tab: escape or right click/PS Circle, Xbox B, Nintendo A
  • fold: mouse wheel/R2 or L2

Development

Fold Stories is actually in development. This is a prototype version with 8 letters to pick up. A new version will be uploaded on a regular basis.

To follow, become part of the development or make a donation, you can go to RedBricks : https://redbricks.games/home/fold-stories-116
